version_description:
64-bit support
Built-in CSV file viewer
Improved multi image picker performance (IAP)
Other minor bug fixes

Built-in RTF viewer
Chromecast video streaming support
New option to quickly upload a single file
Crash fix for multi image upload In App Purchase

1Password support
Improvements to the slide show to allow zoom
Updated Chromecast support
Various stability improvements
Bug fix for DICOM viewer on iOS8
Improvements to prevent crashes when viewing large images
Stability improvements
Bug fix for slide show image viewer

iOS 9 support
Bug fixes
Update to Google Chromecast library to prevent crash on launch plus other minor fixes.

Stability improvements
Bug fixes
Minor cosmetic changes

Bug fixes
Improved crash reporting
Crash and bug fixes to improve stability
Bug and crash fixes

Stability improvements
iOS 10 support

Support for iPhone X and iOS 11
Various bug and crash fixes

Various minor changes and fixes
Support for new devices
Bug and crash fixes

Various minor changes and fixes
Support for new devices

Stability improvements
Support for new devices
Bug fix for problems uploading video files from Photos
Fix for dark mode problems causing text to be invisible

Fix for NTLM authentication problems with Windows Server 2016
Various bug fixes
Search is now updated for iOS 13
Improved stability

Built for iOS 14
Bug fixes for text colour problems in some screens
Bug fix for cursor problem when adding or editing a server
Updated 3rd party dependencies

Fix for problems with Chromecast devices on iOS 14
Improved support for viewing .webloc files

Bug fix for not correctly setting the Last Modified timestamp when downloading files
Various minor fixes
